layout.name: flyAroundHorizontalTime
layout.title: Fly Around Horizontal Time
layout.tooltip: How many frames it takes the NPC to complete a full horizontal movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundHorizontalDistance
layout.title: Fly Around Horizontal Distance
layout.tooltip: How many pixels the NPC moves in each horizontal movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalTime
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Time
layout.tooltip: How many frames it takes the NPC to complete a full vertical movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalDistance
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Distance
layout.tooltip: How many pixels the NPC moves in each vertical movement cycle.

layout.name: Cooldown
layout.title: Cooldown Between Rounds
layout.tooltip: How much time the draggadon will wait to shoot either breathed fireballs or rain down fireballs after one round is finished, measured in seconds.

layout.name: DBFB
layout.title: Delay between breathed Projectiles
layout.tooltip: The delay between breathed fireballs on a single round, measured in seconds.

layout.name: FPRB
layout.title: Breathe Fireballs per Round
layout.tooltip: How many breathed Fireballs will be shot after the Cooldown between rounds finishes. Setting it to 0 will disable this attack.

layout.name: DBFR
layout.title: Delay between raining Projectiles
layout.tooltip: The delay between breathed fireballs on a single round, measured in seconds.

layout.name: FPRR
layout.title: Raining Fireballs per Round
layout.tooltip: How many breathed Fireballs will be shot after the Cooldown between rounds finishes. Setting it to 0 will disable this attack.
